transcript: I've always been a pretty big cash Dapper I always have a lot of liquidity I just feel better with it people like you're not getting the return I was like dude I make a ton of money I also have Layla and so she handles a ton of stuff internally if I didn't have Layla and I was trying to live the most passive Chill Lifestyle I'd probably just put everything into a dividend ETF makes three four percent a year and still gets the appreciation that's just truly zero management passive income qualified dividends for anyone who's curious gets taxed at capital gains rates which are lower but for me though I am going to take bigger risks with the wealth I have because that's the kind of the next level of the game for me taking big bets
